About The CompanyRapid-growing software companyIndustryComputer SoftwareTypePrivately HeldAbout The RoleThe Vice President of Data Science will be responsible for scaling the organization's data analytics team and overseeing key technology functions to drive effective operational management.Travel PercentLess than 10%FunctionsData Management/AnalyticsInformation TechnologyKnown RequirementsBachelor's degree in a STEM-related field requiredMore than 8 years' experience in analytics and data operations requiredExtensive experience in successfully leading and managing teams requiredExcellent knowledge of statistical modeling, time series analysis, and machine learning required
